review: Experience was good. Happy with the Treatment provided.And doctor was well explanator and provided all the information required.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr.Santosh is a very dedicated and professional doctor. He explains the procedures in a systematic way and makes the patient understand the solution of a problem.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: In the first visit, he had asked to undergo some tests/x-rays. From beginning he wanted to take our kid to his clinic and he wants to administer injections *** ** ** *** **** ** **** **** **** *** *** the reason is that these are imported and hence cant be given in cloudnine. We did and then when we went to show the reports, he asked me to pay the consultation fees again even to go through the reports. When I said that it is first time in my life that for followup consultation to just show reports, i need to pay 1150/- while other doctors dont charge in cloudnine. To this, he replied that he is specialist and has to use his brain, so we need to pay full amount for the reports as well. Never seen such a doctor in my life. I told that i will pay and come and to that, he mentioned that he wont see the x-ray reports as it will take time.  Be careful from such person, he can be a specialist but definitely not a person to go to.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very helpful and experienced. Excellent pediatric endocrinologist. Came to know the issue with my child straight away from this doctor which other doctor had not checked. Now we are more clear about what is happening and what can be done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was the very first time that I visited Cloudnine Hospitals. I have heard a lot about it from my friends and colleagues. The doctor and the staff is really helpful. The consultation fee was even satisfactory. It worth your time and money.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My nephew was suffering from Jaundice. We consulted the doctor and within few days we could see a good recovery. I woud highly recommend the doctor. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** **** ****** **** **** *****.very humble very well explained about my daughter's issue..Very pleased with his explanation towards the problem and he spent lot of time discussing about  our problem..I found the best doctor for my daughter..I will 100%recommend this doctor..the best thing is the time he gave for us..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor Santhosh is very helpful and friendly. He helped in analysing the problem very patiently and all the tests done were properly followed up by him. He also followed up with the doctor from other hospital to get an understanding of the lab reports. Highly recommended

tags: None
review: I have seen many doctors in my whole life, but the way Dr. Santosh spent his valuable time and listening to us and understanding the issue is commendable. We were so happy and content after meeting him.
